name: SoftProdigy
description:
SoftProdigy is an award winning software services provider that offers technology solutions to Enterprise, Startups, and Small Businesses. With more than 13 years of experience in the software industry, SoftProdigy has been providing quality, on-time and affordable services to clients across multiple business domains and geographies.
Major Services:
Web Development- Microsoft .Net and Open Source Technologies like- PHP, NodeJS and Python.
Mobile App Development- Native and Hybrid mobile apps for iOS and Android platforms.
Digital Marketing- SEO, SMO, PPC, App Store Optimization and Content Writing.
Readymade Solutions:
eCommerce is a strong area of expertise at SoftProdigy and it has developed several products and solutions related to eCommerce. These include:
Magento Extensions
WooCommerce Extensions
OnGoBuyo- Solution to build native mobile apps for Magento eCommerce stores.
